condition.title: Condition under which the class should be registered for access through JNI

type.title: Type descriptor of the class that should be registered for access through JNI

name.title: Name of the class that should be registered for access through JNI
Method name that should be registered for this class

items.title: List of the method's parameter types
List of methods from this class that are registered for access through JNI

methods.title: List of methods that should be registered for the class declared in <name>

name.title: Method name that are queried for this class

items.title: List of types for the parameters of the this method

parameterTypes.title: List of methods to register for this class that are only looked up but not invoked.

queriedMethods.title: List of methods that are queried for the class declared in <name>

name.title: Name of the field that should be registered for access through JNI

fields.title: List of fields that should be registered for the class declared in <name>

allDeclaredClasses.title: Register classes which would be returned by the java.lang.Class#getDeclaredClasses call

allDeclaredMethods.title: Register methods which would be returned by the java.lang.Class#getDeclaredMethods call

allDeclaredFields.title: Register fields which would be returned by the java.lang.Class#getDeclaredFields call

allDeclaredConstructors.title: Register constructors which would be returned by the java.lang.Class#getDeclaredConstructors call

allPublicClasses.title: Register all public classes which would be returned by the java.lang.Class#getClasses call

allPublicMethods.title: Register all public methods which would be returned by the java.lang.Class#getMethods call

allPublicFields.title: Register all public fields which would be returned by the java.lang.Class#getFields call

allPublicConstructors.title: Register all public constructors which would be returned by the java.lang.Class#getConstructors call

allRecordComponents.title: Register record components which would be returned by the java.lang.Class#getRecordComponents call

allPermittedSubclasses.title: Register permitted subclasses which would be returned by the java.lang.Class#getPermittedSubclasses call

allNestMembers.title: Register nest members which would be returned by the java.lang.Class#getNestMembers call

allSigners.title: Register signers which would be returned by the java.lang.Class#getSigners call

queryAllDeclaredMethods.title: Register methods which would be returned by the java.lang.Class#getDeclaredMethods call but only for lookup

queryAllDeclaredConstructors.title: Register constructors which would be returned by the java.lang.Class#getDeclaredConstructors call but only for lookup

queryAllPublicMethods.title: Register all public methods which would be returned by the java.lang.Class#getMethods call but only for lookup

queryAllPublicConstructors.title: Register all public constructors which would be returned by the java.lang.Class#getConstructors call but only for lookup

unsafeAllocated.title: Allow objects of this class to be instantiated with a call to jdk.internal.misc.Unsafe#allocateInstance

title: JSON schema for the JNI configuration that GraalVM Native Image uses
